mapper.select: select cwa.serial_no, cwa.address, cwa.chain_coin_no, c3.chain_coin_key, c3.chain_coin_name, c3.short_name, c3.coin, c3.chain_name, cwa.balance, cwa.status, cwa.wallet_no, cwa.tenant_id, cwa.create_time, cwa.create_by, cwa.update_time, cwa.update_by from waas_wallet_account as cwa left join waas_chain_coin as c3 on cwa.chain_coin_no = c3.serial_no and c3.del_flag = 0 where cwa.del_flag = 0 and c3.status = 1 and cwa.wallet_no = #{params.walletNo}

select cwa.serial_no as serialNo, cwa.address as address, cw.wallet_name as walletName, cwa.chain_coin_no as chainCoinNo, c3.chain_coin_key as chainCoinKey, c3.chain_coin_name as chainCoinName, c3.short_name as shortName, c3.coin as coin, c3.chain_name as chainName, cwa.balance as balance, cwa.freeze_balance as freezeBalance, cwa.`status` as `status`, cwa.create_time as createTime, cwa.create_by as createBy, cwa.update_time as updateTime, cwa.update_by as updateBy from waas_wallet_account as cwa left join waas_wallet as cw on cwa.wallet_no = cw.serial_no and cw.del_flag = 0 left join crm_chain_coin as c3 on cwa.chain_coin_no = c3.serial_no and c3.del_flag = 0 where cwa.del_flag = 0 and c3.status = 1 and cwa.serial_no = #{serialNo}
